snippet: Despite the Supreme Court's decision last week to uphold much of the law, Americans still remain fairly split on the legislation.
abstract: Despite the Supreme Court's decision last week to uphold much of the law, Americans still remain fairly split on the legislation.

headline.main: Polls: Public Division Remains Over Health Care Law
headline.print_headline: Nation's Verdict: Americans Split on Health Ruling
